org.ambraproject.wombat.config.site.url

Class SiteRequestScheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ambraproject.wombat.config.site.url.SiteRequestScheme
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SiteRequestPredicate

    public class SiteRequestScheme
extends Object
implements SiteRequestPredicate
    Encapsulates the scheme by which URLs and other request attributes are mapped onto Site objects. Each instance of this class corresponds to a particular Site (but does not have the Site as a field -- the composition goes in the other direction).

    The class has two jobs: (1) given a request, determine whether the request is for this object's site; and (2) given a path to an application page, format that path as a full link to that page within this object's site.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SiteRequestScheme.Builder
      A mutable object that gathers the site definition from configuration code.

      • buildLink

        public String buildLink(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
               String path)
        Build a link to a path within a site.

        The link always starts with '/' and is usable as a domain-absolute link to a path on the current site.

        Parameters:
        request - a request to the current site
        path - a site-independent path
        Returns:
        a link to that path within the same site

      • buildLink

        public String buildLink(String path)
        Build a link to a path within a site.

        The link always starts with '/' and is relative to the application root. It is suitable for use in a "redirect:*" return value for Spring.

        Parameters:
        path - a site-independent path
        Returns:
        a link to that path within the same site
